description: Enterprise techniques used by OLDBAIT, ATT&CK software S0138 (v1.1)
name: OLDBAIT (S0138)

techniques.comment: [OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) can use HTTP for C2.(Citation: FireEye APT28)
[OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) can use SMTP for C2.(Citation: FireEye APT28)
[OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) collects credentials from several email clients.(Citation: FireEye APT28)
[OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) collects credentials from Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, and Eudora.(Citation: FireEye APT28)

[OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) installs itself in %ALLUSERPROFILE%\\Application Data\Microsoft\MediaPlayer\updatewindws.exe; the directory name is missing a space and the file name is missing the letter "o."(Citation: FireEye APT28)
[OLDBAIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0138) obfuscates internal strings and unpacks them at startup.(Citation: FireEye APT28)
